about_the_game:
Foul Bliss is a story-oriented psychological horror game. A surreal story about cinema, music, and the coexistence of the beautiful and the terrible.

Feel like you're in an 80s movie with a tape camera style and immerse in the atmosphere thanks to the original soundtrack. Explore a vintage mansion in the middle of a misty forest and meet its inhabitants. Follow the instructions of the voice from the radio and survive in a world between art and reality.

Features of the game:

The original presentation of the plot - an unfamiliar voice from the radio speaks as if it knows the whole story from beginning to end. Can you trust it?

Original Mechanics - experience a rethought approach to the light source used by the player.

The setting of a vintage horror movie - look at the game's world through the eyes of a tape camera of the 80s.

Original soundtrack - Your gameplay is accompanied by a soundtrack diegetically embedded in the game world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4690/ AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700K/ AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • VR Support: No

short_description: Immerse yourself in the retro atmosphere of an 80s movie, accompanied by a vintage soundtrack woven into the gameplay and plot. Explore the intricate story of a fading mind. Survive in a surreal world located between creativity and reality.
